mapper.sql: menu_id, menu_code, menu_name, p_code, icon_cls, `status`, `type`, url, authority, create_time, update_time,order_no
mapper.select:
select
from d_menu where p_code = #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND `type`<>'2' AND `status`='1' order by order_no
mapper.insert: insert into d_menu (menu_code, menu_name, p_code, icon_cls, `status`, `type`, url, authority, create_time, update_time,order_no) values (#{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),null,#{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update d_menu set
menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
p_code = #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon_cls = #{iconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
authority = #{authority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = now() where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update d_menu set menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_code = #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_cls = #{iconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authority = #{authority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = now() where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
